caption.p: Diagrammatic representation of spike protein showing sites for S1 & S2 subunits, Signal sequence (SS), N-terminal domain (NTD), Subdomain (SD) 1 & 2, Receptor binding domain (RBD), Transmembrane domain (TM), Fusion peptide (FP), Internal Fusion peptide (IFP), Heptad repeats (HR), Central helix (CH), Connector domain (CD) and Cytoplasmic tail (CT).
